SUB_W18_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I am arrived in this most dazzling place.
And these curious patterns on the ground
scattered throughout—some manner of
cover or lid, perhaps?

SUB_W18_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_010.text:
See all the people milling about!
This world shows promise indeed.

SUB_W18_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_WRLD_SIUG_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Now to find individuals
of particular interest.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
This is... No. Unlike that other place,
there are no gateways here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
It matters not who you might be.
If you stand before the Dismal King,
you will receive no mercy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
I appear to be somewhere else now.
Perhaps those fiends from earlier are
responsible for the otherworldly
space I found myself in?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
I did not sense you, woman.
How long have you been there?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
I figured you'd be a little more surprised by
whatever the heck THAT just was—and the
fact you weren't tells me you're not ordinary.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
Such a thing hardly merits surprise.
Did you also witness it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, I saw everything. You got on the elevator,
then this place got real weird, then strange
creatures made a beeline straight for you.
I'm guessing you're what they were after?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
But you kept your cool and beat 'em down,
which was QUITE impressive. So do you know
something about everything that just went
down here or what?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
Whatever their true nature, they were
low-grade fiends and little more.
But now I understand why I am here:
it is so I could meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text: ...We met five seconds ago and you think it's fate? You do realize that makes you sound like a creepy murderer, right? Eh, but I suppose I might as well take advantage of this little meet-cute.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FIRST_ATTACK_000_CUT_0.text:
That said, I don't really want to have this
conversation in an elevator, so let's continue
it at my workplace. It's right up ahead.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text: It is time to leave this world.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I'd hoped to see more darkness,
but alas.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Okay, great. This is a much better place to
talk than an elevator—which again, seriously,
who wants to hang out in an elevator? Right then! Intros. I'm Shungiku Hanabusa,
ace reporter for the Capitol City Post,
among other places. Oh, but I wasn't born
here in the Union States.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
This place is called Capitol City? Mmm.
Also, I take 'Union States' to mean
there are other such cities and
nation-states in this world.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Ummm... Yes? We're in Capitol City.
You are one seriously weird dude, dude.
Do you really not know where you are?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text: I am new to this place.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
But it is clear it will prove of great interest
to me. Despite the fiends that strut about,
the city is nonetheless thronged with citizens. And all the covered holes in the ground!
Yes, a place of such dazzling brilliance
must have great darkness lurking within.
But first, what is this black panel?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
That 'black panel' is a television.
Also, you seem a bit wound up there.
You want a drink?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
I will partake of this black liquid.
The smell is intoxicating!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Feeling a bit better? Great.
How about you just introduce yourself?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text: I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Uh, okay? Is that a joke name or something?
You don't LOOK like you're joking, so...
Well, anyway what brings you all the way
to Capitol City, Your Majesty?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
I seek individuals of particular appeal.
But there are many unknowns in this world,
so I demand you travel with me, Shungiku. Surely you must also find your interest
piqued by the darkness of this place?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Ha ha ha! Oh man, it's been a LONG time
since someone called me Shungiku.
How about you just call me Lita?
That's what everyone here does.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, look at the time!
The evening news is about to start. Sorry to interrupt our chat so I can
watch the tube, but us journalists
need to keep tabs on what's going on.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_000.text: This device is a panel, not a tube.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
There were humans within the panel!
What sorcery binds them so!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
So you really don't know about TV,
Your Majesty? Hoo boy. Anyway, the elevator stuff made the news,
but whatever happened there isn't going to
show up on a security cam, so I don't think
it's going to make much of a blip.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
But we don't need the news, because I already
know who's behind all this. Are you ready?
Are you reeeally ready? Okay, here we go...
It was...aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
You speak of individuals
from other worlds?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
That's...basically correct, sure. Boy, I KNEW you were an odd duck! Most people
think I'm joking or crazy when I talk about
aliens, and I end up being laughed out
right of the room. But here's the thing: no one knows why the
aliens are here, which is why I've launched
a secret investigation to find out.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
According to the ensorcelled black panel,
your nation is in the throes of a ritual
to select a 'president.' Do these aliens seek to place their
fingers on the scales of this ceremony?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
That's my biggest fear; if aliens were
to interfere in the election, it would
essentially overthrow our democracy
at its very foundations!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
So far, it doesn't seem like they've been
trying to influence the election. But we're
entering the final stages now, so if they're
going to make a move, this is the time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Now then! Judging from—well, whatever you've
got going on there—you don't have a home base,
so you're welcome to crash here at my work for
a bit while you get that sorted out. Meanwhile, I'm going to head home.
I actually live on this floor—can't
beat a commute like that!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_020.text:
Where goes humanity, so goes darkness—
all the more so when there is a throne
to be struggled for. I suspect this world
will prove an enjoyable stop indeed.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Yes, and you have earned the thanks of the
Dismal King for such. This makes me all
the more certain we were fated to meet.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Flattery will get you nowhere with me.
You just seemed like a guy with a whole
lot of plates in the air, so I felt like you
should stay here instead of a hotel.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_030.text:
Oh, hey! It's time for
the morning news.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
I hear there's lots of money changing hands
right now. And yeah, the owner of that new
commercial building is a hotshot businessman,
but it's still a bit shady.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Oh, that reminds me! I heard from a friend at
the National Research Institute this morning,
and he really wants to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Yeah, I told my friend about you—but no details,
I promise! He doesn't know where you're from,
what you're here for, or anything like that.
You'll be fine talking to him, I promise. Hey, I'm a reporter, remember!?
I protect my sources!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Still, I won't force you to meet up with him,
so if you'd rather go somewhere else first,
that's fine. I'll just be tagging along behind
you wherever you go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Your work will not be harmed
by my doing so?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Well, aren't you surprisingly thoughtful?
But not to worry—my work will get done,
and you'll be the one helping it out! Heck, I can see the headline now:
'Dismal King Comes to Capitol City'!
That's the kind of in-depth reporting
that really sells the news.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text: Then I shall rely on you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
Likewise. Oh, by the way,
you got any money with you?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ABOUT_HERE_000_CUT_050.text:
This story is clearly going to cost me in
more ways than one... But sure, we'll work
something out. Now let's get going already.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, you made it! Good, good. Excellent.
I'm Dr. Nishant, a researcher here at
the NRI. Please, come in, come in!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text: And what is it you research here?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, sorry! Where is my brain right now?
I must not be getting enough sleep. So, we research lots of things. My actual
lab is located elsewhere in the facility
where non-personnel aren't allowed; this is
just a minor research space for my hobby.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_000_.text: Hee hee! Your 'hobby.' I love it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Aaand here we are! My hobby research space.
This little piece of equipment right here
is actually why I wanted to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
I call it the 'Anti-Alien Battle Simulator'—
or A.B.S., for short. Tough name, right? Yes, well, as the name would indicate,
it's a simulator where you fight aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Seeing as you have already repelled some
aliens, Mr. Siugnas, I would very much
like you to evaluate the device.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
You are certain your device
is fit to be entered?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, though this IS the first time I've
had a live test subject in my simulator,
I promise that it's perfectly safe!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text: If you would be so kind, Mr. Siugnas?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_010_.text: Mmm. Very well. I shall indulge you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Fascinating! Having a living person inside
the simulator has produced a series of
entirely different results! If I can tweak the A.B.S. based on this data,
the quality of the simulation should improve
dramatically! I must get started at once...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
While combat in a false reality is an
intriguing endeavor, what I faced was
weaker than the true aliens I battled.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text: I intended them to be weak, sir! The simulation was based on reports of past incidents, as well as observations of the spatial distortions that occurred when other victims became involved.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Why, if I made them any stronger, we'd have
no hope of victory! ...Which I'm just now
realizing is such a difficult fact to accept
that it likely influenced my research. Damn you, blind-trial system! I am unworthy
to call myself a scientist! The whole purpose
of this is to find a means to oppose the aliens,
and I've gone and ruined it all!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
This is your darkness, and you should
embrace it. If you require my aid again,
you shall have it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
I was hoping you'd say that! Anyway,
good luck with the continued research
on your hobby, Dr. Nishant.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Yes, yes, thank you—although I fear I've
been neglecting my actual work too much,
which the Institute will NOT be happy about. Well, I'll just have to do the best I can
on this in whatever spare time I have.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Feel free to use the simulator anytime,
Mr. Siugnas. I've already had an entry card
made for you, so you can access this part
of the lab even when I'm not here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
Just don't spend all of your time on
this glorified arcade machine, or my
article is going to be VERY dull.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESERCHER_000_CUT_020_.text:
I have no knowledge of where I might
locate the kind of individuals I seek,
so let us travel widely.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Whoa, what a commotion! There must
be some kind of incident going on!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text: Hey there, John. What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Always quick to sniff out a
new story, aren't you, Lita? Well, turns out the crystal on display at
the Capitol has been stolen—and according to
eyewitness reports, the culprit JUMPED from
the Upper Layer down to the General! Crazy, right? Anyway, I'm trying
to dig up more evidence now.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
Sounds like something a video game
character would do. You really think
this witness of yours is reliable?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm not at liberty to divulge details
of the investigation. That said,
let me know if you turn up anything
that might pertain to the case.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
He's a cop. It's their job to investigate
cases like this, and the job of citizens
to cooperate with them. That said, as an information source,
cops tend to be a one-way street for
reporters, so I'm certainly not going
to tell them anything I don't have to.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text:
And the culprit leapt from
such a height as this?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_000_CUT_0.text: Nothing is beyond the Dismal King.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
You. What is your intent for that crystal?
Depending on your response, the Dismal King
may grant you his assistance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text: I knew it! He's an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text: We got him! I gotta call John.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
The darkness is faint with this man.
Are you truly an alien?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Caught the thief yourself, eh, Lita?
Impressive. I'll make sure you get an
official commendation from the force.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Don't. It'll just make gathering
info for stories that much harder.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Sure, sure, I getcha. We'll just say
a 'local citizen' cooperated in the
apprehension of the suspect.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
So the secret of the aliens will be
exposed? How disappointingly simple.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
I wouldn't count on it. The police aren't going
to find anything—they never do. This will just
be reported as your run-of-the-mill theft with
some criminal out to make a quick buck.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
An interest in money is not a feeling
I understand. The crystal is valuable,
I take it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
As much as you might expect for a glittery
thing that decorates the Capitol. However,
there have long been rumors about it not
being your ordinary crystal.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text: And this is what the aliens seek.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text:
Might be, might not be. We don't know anything
about what the aliens want to do. Still, we've
thrown a wrench in the works for the moment,
which should help lead us to the next step.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_LOST_CRYSTAL_010_CUT_0.text: Ah. You have your own plan now.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Well, I think it's about
time to call it a day.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
...Hmm? Oh, wait a minute.
I've got a message.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
'Secret meeting tonight between an
Allen supporter and one other individual.
Location: Grand Capitol Hotel lounge.'

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
It strikes me as being potentially linked
to what the people held prisoner inside
the black panel were saying this morning.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Could be—and it'd be one heck of a scoop
to catch someone in the act! That said,
this could also be an intentional leak
by someone with other plans.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text: I have no interest in such.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text: Only one way to know for sure.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_INTRO_000_C.text:
Yeah, I don't feel like risking my
credibility as a journalist on something
this flimsy. Let's just head home.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
Look! That's the bigshot owner of that new
commercial facility. And like the tip said,
he's with one of Allen's supporters—
a local politician of some renown.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
As a king, I know well the practice of
attempting to boost one's own status
by plying the powerful with gifts.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
Sure, but it's still a big deal when it
happens—and wining and dining someone
at a place like this stinks like old fish! Still, the candidate was smart enough
to use a middleman, which is going to
blunt the impact.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
But the fact a political mover and shaker
like this is meeting with the owner gives
me all the dirt I need for a major story.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
Now c'mon. Let's head back so I can
get this thing written. Heh heh heh...

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_SECRET_MTG_QUEST_000_C.text:
From time to time, your face takes
on a most intriguing darkness.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Good work today! Now let's
check out the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_000.text:
So that's how things are looking at the moment.
But they report on each candidate's approval
ratings every day, so this could totally swing
the other direction by tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_010.text:
You humans seem to enjoy partaking in this
ritual, demonstrating through numbers which
candidate is closest to claiming the throne
of your nation.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Oh yeah, we can't get enough of it.
Anyway, let's call it for the day.
See you tomorrow, Your Majesty!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning, sunshine!
Now quick, turn on the news!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_000.text:
The clandestine meeting we observed was
addressed by the individuals imprisoned
within the black panel. Is this your doing?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_010.text:
It sure was! This could be a huge story,
so I have to strike while the iron's hot.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_070_020.text:
Your dissemination of this information
will cause a shift in the hearts of the
people and give rise to new darkness.
You have done well indeed!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_000.text:
Likely a failed attempt at slaughter,
or else a fiend's work besides.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_010.text: You can be pretty disturbing, you know that? Anyways, what the news didn't mention is that the people being attacked all have a ton of social influence.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_020.text:
It's also happening to people who tend to
work alone—internet celebrities and that
sort of thing—rather than politicians or
businesspeople who are always with others.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_030.text:
Also, none of the victims have any idea who
could have attacked them. This stinks to
high heaven of aliens. Aliens, I tell you!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_040.text:
But you need not be concerned about
becoming one of the victims.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_050.text:
Yeah, I've got you with me, so... Hey, are you saying I don't have
any influence? What a jerk!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_080_060.text:
Now then, what events might
we encounter today?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_000.text:
Are you interested in the debate they
mentioned on the news? I could use my
press pass to get in if you want.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_010.text:
Can this debate not be entered
without special dispensation?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_020.text:
Yeah, both candidates will be there,
so security's tight. But I also don't
HAVE to go, so it's all up to you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_030.text:
And sure, it'll be packed with reporters
and broadcast across Capitol City, but
I bet you'll see some things in person
that you'd miss otherwise.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_040.text:
News reports aren't everything, you know.
Sometimes you have to just get out there,
grab life by the lapels, and shake it
until you see what falls out!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_050.text:
A suitably demanding approach. Your own labors
have fueled your acquisition of information
pertaining to these aliens that is otherwise
unknown to your people.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS01_000_CUT_090_060.text:
See? You get it. So if you want to see the
debate, I'll just say you're my assistant. ...We're going, right?
Say we're going!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I know I'm sort of dragging you into my work
here, so lemme give you the lowdown. Basically,
debates are a venue in which participants share
their opinions on topics determined in advance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Hmm. Strange. The moderator generally keeps
things moving, but this one is coming off a
little weird. It's almost like he's backing
James Allen on everything he says...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
It is possible he simply supports
candidate James Allen.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
It's possible—but as a professional moderator,
it would be a massive breach of ethics.
I just can't imagine him doing that.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Nonetheless, the fact he is unable to—
or perhaps uninterested in—hiding his
true allegiance holds great appeal to me. For you see, I have deep interest in
individuals such as yourself who
are able to do so completely.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_FORUM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Ugh. This is about as far from a 'fair' exchange
of ideas as you can get. I'm glad I got to see
this in person; we might not have noticed his
subtle bias if we weren't sitting here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, Mr. Siugnas! Welcome, welcome.
Now then, what level would you
like the simulation set to?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Let's gather more data on enemies we can beat.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text: Let's make a guess at the capabilities of a normal alien.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_000.text:
Then I shall demonstrate for you all
the power at the Dismal King's command!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_010.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_BATTLE_SIM_000_CUT_010.text:
Oh, but this data is WONDERFUL!
Please do come back soon, Siugnas.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
I briefly considered having you stay here,
but then I thought better of it. It's a place
for VIPs, which means it's super pricy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text: You lack the needed funds, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text: Something like that—although it is nice to treat yourself to a fancy dinner every now and again!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
It sure does—although it used to be outside.
See, it was here when the hotel was built
over a hundred years ago, and the man who
founded this place really loved it. Some time ago, a redevelopment plan was
launched for Capitol City that involved
cutting it down, but the hotel fought it
tooth and nail.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Eventually, they reached an agreement where
the redevelopment plan paid for the tree to
be replanted inside the hotel. As the hotel tells it, there were concerns
the tree might immediately wither and die,
but it perked right back to life because
the founder's soul lives on inside it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_VIP_HOTEL_000_CUT_000_.text:
Anyway, enough of that! I didn't get any
tips that require me to be here today,
so how about we get going?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Hey, sorry, but I just got contacted by
a friend. Mind if we head somewhere?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Apparently there was a spatial distortion
sighted in a particular section of the
General Layer, and I'm thinking it might
be connected to the aliens. Wanna go?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_INTRO_000_C.text:
Not interested? Huh, suit yourself.
We'll just head home, then.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
According to my source, this is the place
where the spatial distortion was seen.
...Huh? What in the—

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
Still your fears. The assailants attempted to draw
you into the other dimension, so I crossed over
and ended them. The utter gall of it, trying to take
what is mine by rights.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
Oh my gosh, this explains the people who
are being cut! Since they're being hurt
in a different dimension, it seems to
be happening instantaneously!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_KAMAITACHI_QUEST_000_C.text:
We might have been lured out, but thanks to you,
we were able to turn the tables on the culprit.
Case closed, and no one is the wiser! Now let's
get back so I can fill my friend in on all this.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Good work today.
And now, it's news time!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_000.text:
So that's what we're looking at today.
Those two men are vying for the presidency,
and the news is giving us a good idea
of what each one stands for.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_010.text:
And your nation will see great change
depending on which one sits the throne.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Oh, you don't know the half of it.
The current president has done a lot,
so there's a heavy responsibility
waiting for whoever takes over. Do we develop the Union States further,
or do we seek stability instead?
It's going to be a tough choice.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_030_040.text:
No matter which combatant bests the other,
darkness shall surely follow. I should like
to continue looking in on this nation's
people as the contest plays out.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning! Man, I slept like a ROCK.
Now then, I wonder what fascinating
mysteries might await us today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_000.text:
So she's finally making her
major label debut, eh?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_010.text:
The magic panel's occupants seemed
to describe an event of great importance
to your nation.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_020.text:
I mean, sure? She's massively talented
at the very least, and was a real big
deal even before the label signed her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_030.text:
Entertainment news is outside my wheelhouse,
so I totally forgot today was her big album
launch. But, uh, we can go check it out if
you're curious about her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_070_050.text:
Ha! Easy-breezy, just like always.
Now let's get going.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_000.text:
So she's finally making her
major label debut, eh?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_010.text:
She must be an individual of particular
appeal to command such attention amidst
your presidential succession ritual.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_020.text:
Oh, she's massively talented—she was
huge even before the label signed her.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_030.text:
And while I'm curious about her debut, I'm even
more curious about public sentiment around the
election—and there's no way to do that other than
picking the brains of Joe and Jane Lunchpail!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_040.text:
The people of your nation
are quite frank.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS02_000_CUT_080_060.text: A king does not hide his thoughts!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_SINGER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_SINGER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Whoa, there's already a ton of people here!
Guess I shouldn't be surprised, seeing as
she's giving a free concert.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_SINGER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_SINGER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, we won't get anywhere near the stage
at this rate. But if you like her music, I'll let
you listen to everything I've downloaded
when we get back to the office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_SINGER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_SINGER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
This is enough; I can see she possesses appeal
enough to draw together so many of your people.
If she is meant to be one with the Dismal King,
then we shall meet again.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Huh? What are you two doing here?
You really should leave.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Did something happen? Biohazard breach!?
Radiation leak!? Dimensional tear!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Oh, some of our alternative-energy equipment
has spiraled out of control and is now in
danger of exploding. Nothing major.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_04.text: Oh ho! Do go on, scientist.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_05.text:
It's small-scale equipment that's contained
behind a three-stage barrier—so even if there
IS an explosion, the laboratory isn't at risk. We just want people to evacuate
out of an abundance of caution.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Okay, but that still doesn't explain why
you're running an out-of-control energy
experiment in the middle of the city.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Well, everything was simply peachy through
yesterday—but when I increased the output
for today's test, we suddenly lost control. Before I fled the lab, I saw a strange device
attached to the control unit. I think it's
the cause of all this, but I don't know what
it is, much less how to stop it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_08.text:
Smells like sabotage to me.
You think it's the aliens?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_09.text: Show me to your device, scientist.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_10.text:
You can't be serious, Mr. Siugnas.
It's much too dangerous.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_11.text:
I am the Dismal King. Darkness in all its
forms bends the knee to my command.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Well, I don't have any basis for this,
but I somehow feel like you can do it.
So follow me, I guess!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_00.text:
You could have waited outside.
Are you not afraid?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_01.text:
I'm not going to stand around
and miss the scoop of the century,
thank you very much!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_010_02.text: Er, actually, everything you see here is highly, highly classified, so you can't write about any of this unless you want a scary visit from some very large men.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Control has been restored!
The levels are dropping!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_01.text: The sound has stopped as well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_02.text:
You did it! Hooray for you!
Also, now I can write my article.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Did you not hear what I said earlier?
Confidential! Secrets! Very large men!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_04.text:
Which is all the more reason I HAVE to write it.
This is clearly part of an alien attack, which means
they know the National Research Institute is part
of our anti-alien efforts!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_05.text:
And if you're right and they can attack us
like this whenever they please, we have no
real way to fight back! Please, Lita. Most of my colleagues at the
Institute have nothing to do with aliens.
I can't drag them into this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_07.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_020_07.text:
Yes, well, I have to clean up this
incid... Er, this 'unusual situation.'
I will see you both some other time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELEMENT_000_CUT_030_00.text:
These conditions are wreaking
havoc on my concentration.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
My news magazine is based in this office
building, along with a number of other
businesses. Oh, and it also has this
delightful little cafe!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Are you nuts!? Allen is CLEARLY the right
choice! What's Bailey ever done, huh?
Nothing! A big stinking pile of nothing!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Capitol City's economy is amazing right now
because of Allen. And if he wins, things are
only going to get better!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Sorry, but I just don't agree. Sure, Allen is
proactive with business, science, and tech—
and yes, we'll likely be a stronger country if he
wins—but he's just too much of a hard-liner.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
But with Bailey, you get someone who's steady
and even-keeled. You get a sense of stability,
which is just as important as growth.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, well. Looks like some of my neighbors
are engaged in a heated political debate.
You get this a lot during election season.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey! You there!
What do YOU think about all this!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Easy, Violetta! You can't just grill
people about their personal beliefs.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, I don't mind—besides which, I very much
want to hear what my new companion thinks.
He always mumbles something vague and mealy,
so let's hold some feet to the fire!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
My response will have no impact on their
succession ceremony, so what would make
things the most interesting? Mmm...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
So how about it, new guy? Based on the
campaign so far, who do YOU support!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Violetta_Kim
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Right!? RIGHT!? You gotta go with the
tried-and-tested record of success!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Stephan_Eliasson
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
An excellent choice. A president should
bring a sense of stability to the job,
instead of flash and trickery.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
And there you have it, Siugnas!
Your very first political debate!
Did you enjoy it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_DISCUSSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Quite. It is most amusing to witness
the oscillation between joy and sorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
Hmm... That woman looks rather
out of place for the Institute.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
My journalist senses are kicking in hard.
Let's follow her!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_000_CUT_00.text:
What? Talk about a buzzkill. But fine,
we'll head home for the day.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey, you just came out of the NRI, right?
Cutting a pretty weird path through the
city, don't you think? What's your deal?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
We can take this to mean the research
being conducted at the Institute is in
no way convenient for the aliens.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Doctor Nishant really picked a
terrible time to lose his nerve.
What the hell are we supposed to—

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Hold it. You two were the ones lurking
around during the incident at the
National Research Institute today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
I'm Bonnie Blair, and this little
rascal here's Formina Franklyn. We're with the Capitol City Police Department, but
we're currently on loan to the Office of the President—
so you two cowpokes can just think of this as a
friendly little chat with the president's office!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
We've already spoken to the director of the
Institute—one Doctor Nishant—so please
hold nothing back during our questioning.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
If you already talked to him, we've got
nothing to add. The two of us don't know
anything about what goes on in the NRI.
We just happened to be there, is all.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
And the creatures you call 'aliens'?
What about them?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Hey, you're the ones working for the president,
so maybe stop asking me these inane questions
and go DO SOMETHING ABOUT THEM before this
all explodes into a serious incident!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
The Office of the President is well aware of
the situation—and while it won't get any public
attention, I can assure you the NRI has been
directed to continue its activities as before.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Also, y'all didn't ask for my opinion,
but I don't believe in aliens or UFOs
or any of that. All a buncha horse plop,
if ya don't mind my sayin' so.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
Then I guess there's nothing
more for us to discuss.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_000_CUT_01.text:
It certainly was—but let's
leave him be for now.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text: That woman was in quite the rush.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text:
Sure was. And I'm fine, by the way.
Just a little surprised, is all.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text: My curiosity is stoked. After her!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_INTRO_010_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, I was getting some weird vibes from
her, too. C'mon, she went this way!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey there. You bumped into me earlier—
which is totally fine, these things happen.
We were just concerned that something
might be wrong. Why the big hurry?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Can't believe we bumped into an alien
right here in the city. I swear I'm a
magnet for this kind of stuff...

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Goodness gracious! I detected a distortion
in space-time and came here to investigate,
and what should I find but the pair of you! So, er, was there an alien here?
Did I miss it?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, but we handled it. That said,
I'm actually surprised you came out
of your lab to see it in person.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
I suspect the alien you tangled with is the
one responsible for the incident at the NRI.
I couldn't risk it coming into contact with any
of the other researchers, so I came straightaway.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Wait, did something happen
at the lab!? Are you okay!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I'm quite well, thank you.
Our three-stage barrier managed
to prevent a large-scale explosion.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, this is all off the record, but the
National Research Institute is currently
researching alternative energy—and it's a
very challenging thing to keep under control! But this morning, someone attached a device
to the control system that caused a good deal
of interference—hence the exploding and the
booms and whatnot.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Ah. Then the alien we encountered hoped
to cause the energy apparatus to spin
wildly out of control.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Meaning the alien wanted your research
to fail, and was willing to go to any
lengths to make it happen. I'm just glad the lab's barrier prevented
an even greater catastrophe here.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Stunning we should encounter the alien by chance.
Are you drawn to darkness—or is it the reverse,
I wonder? Whatever the case, you are proving
to be an utterly intriguing individual.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_CAUSE_QUEST_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, seeing as the two of you have dealt with
the culprit, I should head back to the NRI and
get started on the repair work. Oh, and my little
laboratory is safe too, so don't worry about that.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Your organization that opposes the aliens.
I presume it counts more than you and
Nishant among its membership?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm in direct contact with about ten people,
but for the safety of the organization,
none of us knows everyone's identity.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Thus could even your neighbor
be a comrade.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Or thus could he be an alien. But hey, the
unknown of having lots of strangers living in
close proximity is what makes a city great.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_000_040.text: Anyways, let's see what's on the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Three days to go until the election,
and the aliens are busier than ever.
This is honestly exhausting.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_010.text:
If the aliens were involved in the ceremony
and you knew it for a certainty, you'd not
be forced to run to and fro as you do now.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_030_020.text:
No, but I'd have a different can of worms
to deal with, so I'll stick with my current
situation. And since my nerves are pretty
frazzled, I'm just going to call it a day.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning. I don't imagine there's going to be
anything big going down today, but we should
check the news anyway.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_000.text:
Looks like I was right and the candidates
aren't planning any big moves—which is my
chance to go track down a huge scoop in
the form of a personal-interest story!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_020.text:
Oh, finding a story about someone's private
life is the scoopiest of scoops.
Now let's get out into the world and
track down something interesting!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS03_000_CUT_060_030.text:
One would scarce believe you are
the same Lita with a cavalcade of
complaints from last night.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Such fascinating creatures.
They are yours, then?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, heavens no! I'm just taking care of
them. These kitties belong to everyone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Stray cats tend to gather in this particular
corner of the Inspectorate, and Jessica here
is always kind enough to take care of them.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, there's no need for praise, dearie; I love taking care of my special kittens! Honestly, even though I'm on the staff here, I sometimes feel like taking care of them is my real job.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_040.text: Hey, look over there. Is that...?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Goodness, there's clearly no escaping
the watchful eye of a talented reporter! But yes, dear, that's Noah Bailey, the
presidential candidate. He's helping to
clean up this area—and doing so on the
'down-low,' as the children like to say.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Even though he's a very important politician,
he's always wandering around town picking up
trash and cleaning graffiti. Oh, but please
don't put any of this in a story!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
If the whole world learned he was doing this,
he couldn't stay on the down-low—and that
means the trash wouldn't get cleaned anymore!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Well, this is a real dilemma. My journalistic
senses are screaming for me to turn this into
a story, but I also understand what Jessica
is saying about it ruining Bailey's good work.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_010.text: Write the story if you wish it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
It is of no consequence to me what you do.
But humans do so enjoy making public others'
secrets, and I should like to see how your story
moves the hearts and minds of the people.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_050.text:
That is so adorably innocent, I want to
hug you until your stuffing falls out. Still, I love it—and since I don't know for
sure which option would help Bailey more,
I'll just write the best story I can.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_060.text:
You're right. Bailey genuinely seems to
be doing a good thing here, and turning
that into a scoop for my own personal
gain feels pretty skeezy.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_CATS_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Bailey's strategy of not making his good
deeds public may be intentional. If so,
we ought to see how it unfolds.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, now we're in the other dimension!?
This must mean...

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
This is similar to when I first arrived
in this world. Be on your guard for
enemies of all stripes, Lita.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Then you have already named everyone
in this place as your enemy?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Your greeting was particularly...impassioned.
I am prepared to continue where we left off,
should you wish it.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Tsk! So belligerent. Did it ever occur to you
to approach a problem with dialogue instead
of simply running straight at it? I can offer
good terms, if you are willing to listen.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
You wish to see this world filled with darkness.
I am on the cusp of bringing chaos to Capitol City,
and when I have finished, you will most assuredly
be able to find the dark you seek. At this point, you will be free to move on
to the next station along your journey.
A fine offer, is it not?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: I do indeed seek darkness here.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: Very well. I leave it to you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: I refuse. There would be no point.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm pleased you were willing
to parley. Farewell.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: A sham darkness wrought by your machinations is hardly enough to garner my interest. The Dismal King seek a true dark!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Are you certain you wish to refuse?
I'll not make such an offer again.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: An entertaining offer. I accept!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text: Do not make me repeat myself.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
A pity it had to come to this.
Ah, well. Death it is, then.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Chaos will soon be visited upon this world.
You will have no shortage of material to cover,
and I suspect your work will become quite busy.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
He didn't seem much like an alien,
but then again, who knows?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
His true nature is of no concern to me,
nor what becomes of this world. I merely
enjoyed witnessing the clash for your
nation's throne.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, so you're just going
to abandon me!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I am no virtuous king—I am the Dismal King!
Do you mean to suggest you seek salvation
from I, the ruler of the dark?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, I suppose I may have assumed a bit
much there—but you're just so dang strong!
Can't blame a girl for dreaming, right?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
Your dreams were but nightmares.
And with that, farewell.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
These aliens must be truly pressed
to approach me with such a proposal.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
You said your goal was to find darkness
or whatever, right? Well, wouldn't that
have been easier if you just went along
with what he was suggesting?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_WARNING_000_CUT_.text:
I am not nearly so flippant about my objective
as to go along with such a harebrained scheme.
Also, I am enjoying myself well enough on this
journey we are sharing together.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
That was merely a test of your strength.
I thought you had realized as much.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
It would seem you very much wish
to experience my full power.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
We are the same as you: we have each
come to this world with an objective. We do not wish to interfere with your goal,
nor do we want you to interfere with ours.
I seek only to know what your objective is.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I have come seeking darkness that compels
my interest. No more and no less.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
The nuances of your meaning are lost to me,
but I understand your purpose now, and know
it will not conflict with our own. As such, I ask that you pursue your
objectives, and your objectives alone.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Do not get in your way, in other words.
Fortuitously for you, doing so was never
my intent. But know this: if I should find darkness
lurking in your shadow, this will not be
the last time we meet.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
We are well aware of your strength, and seek
no quarrel with you. We hope only that you
achieve your goal in short order.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Was that an alien? What happened?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
A scouting expedition, and a warning besides.
They came, I suspect, to determine if my
presence might become a threat to them.
But worry not, for I will protect you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
It's sure reassuring to have you
on my team, Your Highness! As a reporter, I welcome all the trouble I can
handle, but as a member of the anti-alien
organization, I'd rather not provoke them until
we have a better idea what we're dealing with.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_EVENT_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Acceptable. I will consider
this as we move forward.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
I hear someone sent a tip to the
police from the Metropolitan Building.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text: A new darkness may be in store.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text: A ploy to entice you, I suspect.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_INTRO_000_CUT_000.text:
Heck, now you've got ME worried!
Fine, fine. We'll head home.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
The building alarms inside are going off,
but it doesn't look like the police have
arrived quite yet.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Do you possess some means by which
you are able to locate such incidents?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
There is someone over there. Also,
what is that black cylinder you hold?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
It's my camera—I'm always ready in case
something like this happens. Also,
it looks like the cops just showed.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Aw, hell. Lita? How'd you get here
before we did—or were you actually
the one who tipped us off?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
We happened to be passing by when we heard the
alarm—and when I heard breaking glass, I started
taking photos. There could be something useful
there, so feel free to take a look.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
Appreciate it. Now let's see what we've got...
Hold the damn phone! Forget 'something useful,'
you've got shots of the window moments after it
broke. Almost feels too good to be true.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
If you have any suspicions, you know how to
find me. Oh, and while I'm happy to testify 
to whatever you need, right now I'm out.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Detective_John
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
The alarm that went off was located in
Allen's campaign office. This whole thing
stinks to high heaven if you ask me!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text:
I wager you have been embroiled in the
conflict over your nation's throne by the
design of some unknown party.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_QUEST_000_CUT_000.text: I guess we'll find out tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_000.text:
A question: is there a layer
higher than your Upper Layer?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Are you thinking about the elevator between
the Capitol and the Inspectorate? Yeah,
they don't let normal people use that.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_020.text:
It connects right to the president's office,
so it's locked down for security purposes.
Only the president or members of his
cabinet are allowed to use it.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Yes, one must always maintain a strong
defense around a royal fortress.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
'Fortress' is an interesting interpretation of
what we're talking about—sorta reminds me
how things that are common sense for us
might not be that way for you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_000.text:
An attack on a campaign office?
That's trouble right there.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Striking at your enemy's base of
operation is the most effective way
to slay your foe in glorious battle!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Yeah, we're really not much for
'glorious foe slaying' around here. That said, this election has basically
become a duel between the two candidates,
and their supporters are desperate.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_030.text:
And sure, previous elections in the Union
States always had your typical skullduggery,
but it was nothing like this.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_030_040.text:
In any event, I'm headed back to my
place to finish some work. Good night.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_040_000.text: Morning! Let's pop the news on.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
So it was all an inside job, eh?
I guess that's one explanation.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
A thrall would sacrifice all in offering
to their lord; there is nothing Allen's
own would not do to see him crowned.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
Which means this might be a much bigger crisis
than they're letting on. Allen's camp has clearly
put their foot in it, but I'm not sure we should
think about it so simply.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
There is also the possibility
the anti-Allen faction used you.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_030_.text:
If they did, they're gonna find
that I don't come cheap.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text:
Harassment, huh? Bailey's side will deny it
to their dying breath, but it's hardly
surprising that they're suspected—and this
is the kind of thing that can swing a vote.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text:
Humans enjoy provocation and excitement.
The truth matters little.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_RAID_NEWS_000_CUT_040_.text:
Which is why there's a never-ending
firehose of false and salacious news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_070_000.text:
Anyway, time for us to get
out there and seize the day!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_000.text:
Looks like there won't be any major
election-related events today.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_010.text:
That said, unexpected things are sure to
crop up—things like this office incident—
so I'm going to put the job of discovering
them into your capable hands!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS04_000_CUT_080_020.text:
A sound decision; I fully anticipate
encountering interesting beings today.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text: Greetings, humans! I am an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, how convenient! I've been
wanting to interview an alien. So which planet do you hail from?
Or are you from another galaxy entirely?
I assume you use a flying saucer, right? Also, how do you like the food?
Oh, and are you here all alone,
or did you come in a group?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am no alien.
I am the Dismal King.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I suspect you are not alone in
wanting your questions answered.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Have you ever even seen an alien before?
And I mean besides me, so don't go saying
'I'm looking at one right now.'

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I don't WANT to meet an alien—also,
your little street show here sucks,
so I'm not leaving a tip. Let's go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Nigel_Patriot
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESEARCH_000_CUT_000_0.text:
In this insular little world, outsiders have
long been viewed as witches and monsters—
and now aliens as well! Ah, but how will they deal with interference
that truly comes from outside their world?
It is ever so interesting...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The coffee here is amazing, and the hotel cafe
sells the roasted beans so you can have it at
