home. Let's drop in for a minute, 'kay?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the source of the drink you provide
each morning? I must return home with a
great supply of it, for this black liquid
has a flavor worthy of the darkness.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_020.text: Oh, look! Emily's in the cafe!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_030.text: The singer we discussed? What of her?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Hi, there! You're Emily Bryant,
right? I'm a big fan.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I'm a reporter named Lita Caryx,
and this is my assistant, Siugnas.
I don't really cover entertainment,
but it's still great to meet you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Aw, it's nice to meet you guys, too.
And Siugnas, wow! That's an unusual name.
Also, those eyes of yours are so...
Er, wait. What am I on about?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You seem to be alone.
Are you waiting for someone?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_100.text: Yeah, I'm meeting my agent here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_110.text:
No surprise someone as popular as you
would have a busy schedule—and how crazy
is it that you made your big debut just
before the election!? You've got a lot of guts; I would have
been worried about my album getting
lost in all the noise.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Yeah, that was a risk, but I wanted to get it
out during the election so my music wouldn't
be tied to any particular president, you know? And since I can keep any spotlight on me focused
on news about the debut, I don't have to deal with
a bunch of annoying interviews from people who
want to know which of the candidates I support.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I guess that's one way
to think of it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Hee hee! Speaking of which, THIS is
starting to feel like an interview!
Guess you really are a journalist, huh?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Does it!? Oh gosh, sorry about that.
I wasn't trying to do that, I swear.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Aw, it's okay. And since you're a fan,
I'm gonna go ahead and skip my usual
interview fee. Whoops! I see my agent there.
Gotta go!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Thanks for talking with me,
and good luck with everything!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ARTIST_000_CUT_000_180.text:
I can see why your people are enchanted
by her. She was most fascinating.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text: Well, I'll be hog-tied and tossed in a barrel! More aliens!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
We're going to have more alien sightings
than we know what to do with if we keep
trying to chase down all of these leads.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text: Yeah, I reckon this is just another street performance—which don't make a lick of sense, because who in their right mind wants to see someone pretendin' to be an alien!? I swear, I had no idea bein' an investigator would be so much work.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
So the CCPD is chasing aliens now?
I had no idea...

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text: It will not be worth your time.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
You read my mind. If this is about
aliens, we can't ignore it. C'mon!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_PRESIDENT_INTRO_000_CU.text:
Good point. If those two want to waste their
time chasing after a bunch of half-baked
street performers, that's their problem.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hmm. He vanished. Perhaps these aliens
are more real than we gave them credit
for initially.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text: Or we just mistook what we saw.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm Lita Caryx with the Post.
Did something happen?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, just a little spate of street performers
actin' like aliens. We ain't managed to run
any of 'em down yet, but maybe y'all have?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
We have, actually—and they weren't remotely
entertaining. Frankly, you're better off just
leaving them be...unless there's something
criminal about their activities?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Our information suggests there is
one odd 'alien' out here somewhere. Unfortunately, we can't pin down exactly
what is odd about them—just that they are.
Hence our investigation.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, the man we ran into wasn't particularly
odd, unless you count being the world's least
entertaining entertainer as odd.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
We appreciate your cooperation. Here is our
contact information. Please get in touch if
you come across anything of note.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Huh? This says you work for the
Presidential Security Office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Aw, that's just temporary.
We're sorta on loan to 'em from
the Capitol City Police Department.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sounds like the president might be trying to
do something about the aliens. This calls
for some good old-fashioned sleuthing!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
I hope I go the rest of my life without
running into an 'alien' street performer.
Was there some kind of incident?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Our investigation is designed to prevent an
incident from occurring. We received information
about an odd 'alien' somewhere in the city—
not that I place any stock in such things.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
If you ask little ol' me, aliens and
UFOs and whatnot ain't nothin'
but a big pile'a horse plop.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_PRESIDENT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Here is our contact information.
Please get in touch if you come
across anything of note.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Home sweet home!
C'mon, let's watch the news.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Allen's quote about the
plane is pretty odd.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_030.text:
I mean, sure, the Union States leads the world
in a lot of technological areas, but VTOL for
passenger planes is a pipe dream's pipe dream.
Hell, it'd be more magic than science.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_040.text:
Can the ground withstand it? Is everyone aware of
how difficult it would be to control? There are all
kinds of technical hurdles to overcome, and some
of those are a long way from being solved. I know Allen likes to talk
a big game, but still.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_050.text:
While I am ignorant in matters of technology,
there must be some basis for that man to go
so far in his assertions.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_060.text:
Yeah, maybe my instincts are wrong here.
Anyway, see you tomorrow.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_030_070.text:
Your instincts are often good—
which is why tomorrow promises
to be most intriguing.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_000.text:
Morning! ...Uh, what's up?
You look concerned.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_040_010.text:
Nothing. Let us tune in to the people
trapped inside your black panel.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_070_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_070_000.text:
Okay, that's all good to know.
Now let's get rolling!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_000.text:
What might one expect from
this 'campaign rally'?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_010.text:
The candidate gets up on stage and gives a fiery
speech to hype their own supporters and drum up
new ones. Gathering people together in person
like that helps to build a sense of solidarity.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_020.text:
Also, some candidates go press the flesh
with their supporters after the speech,
so a lot of people come just to try and
meet someone famous.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_030.text:
So the next ruler and his thralls
will meet? Ah, but this ought to
prove most intriguing indeed!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_040.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS05_000_CUT_080_040.text:
You want to check it out? They let anybody
in there, so if you're interested, just pop
on over to the venue at Metro Square.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay, this is weird. What's with the heckling?
Everyone at this rally should all be on the
same page about Bailey.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: リーダー格の男
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Whaddaya mean Bailey isn't here!?
You're supposed to be on top of this!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: 集会主催者
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Everything is fine, sir. A car accident
has snarled traffic around the area,
but he should be arriving shortly.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: リーダー格の男
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_04.text:
That's because our traffic policies are
USELESS! Also, the fact he's making his
possible constituents wait is PROOF
Bailey doesn't take us seriously!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_05.text:
That man is another thrall? I sense no anger
in his words—in fact, he seems to be rather
enjoying the entire scene.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: リーダー格の男
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, if he won't speak, then I will!
In fact, I'll give a speech so good,
Bailey is SURE to win!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Okay, this is getting way out of hand.
I'm not going to be able to cover the
rally at this rate.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: リーダー格の男
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_08.text:
Oh, look who it is. Perfect timing.
You're coming with me!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_000_CUT_000_09.text:
You are bold indeed to lay claim
to a companion of the Dismal King!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_000_00.text:
I bet this'll be way more fun than
busting up the campaign rally.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Do you even know who I AM, you idiot!?
There are serious penalties for interfering
with the press in this country!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, I know exactly who you are...
which is why you and me are gonna
go somewhere VERY far away!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I wonder if you would allow me to
accompany you on this journey?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_010_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_010_00.text:
I had thought these aliens
to have rather sharper wits.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_010_01.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_010_01.text:
Right!? I mean, interfering this blatantly
in a democratic election is NOT going to
fly with me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_010_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_010_CUT_010_02.text:
You mustn't let your guard down. If you
allow yourself to be taken so easily,
you'll find your luck reaching its end.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_00.text:
We're getting to the good part of the
rally now. Just listen to those cheers!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_01.speaker: 集会主催者
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_01.text:
Hey, you're that pair from earlier.
You two all right?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_02.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_02.text:
We sure are! We talked everything out and
convinced those people to turn around
and just call it a day.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_04.speaker: 集会主催者
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_04.text:
They were...crying? Okay, that's weird.
Also, who even were they? Did someone
hire them to sabotage Bailey's rally?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_05.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_05.text:
I asked them about that, but they wouldn't say.
Probably for the best, since anything that came
out of their mouths would assuredly be a lie.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_06.speaker: 集会主催者
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MEETING_040_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, the rally went off without a hitch,
so I'll stop speculating. Thanks so much
for all of your help today.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Goodness, dearie! We certainly are
seeing a lot of each other lately.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Or maybe it's just that you've been
spending more time outside.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, I suppose that's true. There's just so
much to investigate in our work that I have
to take a breather every now and again.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
In addition to watching out for the usual
election-season shenanigans, the head of the
Security Office has also been acting oddly.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Well then, it's time for me to get back
to work. Good luck out there, dearie!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Yep. Someone's definitely
stirring up trouble.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
I suspect you will be interested in both
the election fraud and eccentricities of
your Security Office leader, but which has
the greater potential for darkness?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Probably the second. The head of the Presidential
Security Office is a man named Tristan Hernandez.
He's an old military buddy of the president—
they were both heroes of the Channel War.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
Being chief of the Security Office is a more
modest job than you'd think, but the president
apparently trusts Hernandez more than anyone.
And if he's behaving strangely...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
And she knew you would be interested,
and so fed the information to you.
This Jessica knows you all too well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_000_CUT_000.text:
We cannot permit a juicy
story like this to escape.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Have you any news on the activities
of your Security Office leader?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Thankfully, I've got a lead on that.
We just need to sit tight and wait
for him to pass by here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text: You've a sharp nose for trouble.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Look! There's Hernandez!
And he's alone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
This man protects your ruler, does he not?
Could it not be possible he has been
charged with a secret mission?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Could be, but he's in charge of the entire
Secret Service. It's very strange for him
not to at least have some other security
officers around...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Lita, I just detected a spatial
distortion near your location.
Have you been attacked again?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
No, nothing's going on here.
We're totally fine.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Ah, that's a relief! Well, the distortion
was brief as usual, so I wouldn't worry.
Talk to you soon.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Hm... You know, if we're not the only ones
who can get caught up in these weird
spatial anomaly things...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Then your Security Office
head could have as well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
That's exactly what I think—AND I think
he was holding a secret meeting.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Perhaps with one of the aliens, even.
If he is connected to them somehow,
this election promises to be enjoyable
right through its conclusion!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
Is the president aware of his activities,
or is Hernandez acting alone? Either way,
this is a major development.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_MELANCHOLY_010_CUT_000.text:
There's not enough evidence to go public,
but we've got a lead now—and I never let
a lead escape.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Another day finished up.
Let's see what's on the tube.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_000.text:
Things sure have been eventful in the
lead-up to the election, huh? I haven't
had a moment's rest since you got here.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_010.text:
Oh, but don't get me wrong—I'm not griping.
Always better to be busy than bored, right?
Anyway, good night!

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_020.text:
I have enjoyed my time in this world so far.
And though Lita plans to fight aliens and I
am one from the perspective of this world,
this feels a thing of little consequence.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_030_030.text:
Tomorrow, the ruler of this land shall be
decided. Oh, how long has it been since
I have so looked forward to a new day!?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_010.text:
Good morning! Sorry for the delay,
but I just finished voting.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_020.text: You do not need to work there?

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_040.text:
Mmm. A shrewd observation. After all,
none else can guide the Dismal King.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_050.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_050.text:
I'm honored to hear that. Of course,
if you're interested, we can still
check out the polling place.

SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_060.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_FUNC_SIUG_NEWS06_000_CUT_040_060.text:
Anyway, today's news cycle is going
to be dominated by the election,
so let's hurry up and go!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Such a crowd. People from throughout
your city are all gathered here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Electronic voting is pretty common outside
of Capitol City, but here, the old-fashioned
method of voting in person is alive and well. It's almost like a festival—or even a ritual,
like you called it. Choosing a president is
just a really special time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Is there some difference in a ruler
chosen by the people and one who
rules by birthright alone?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Uh, wow. That's a heavy question. I mean,
the system is obviously different, but in
terms of having authority in emergencies
and the like, I guess they're the same? Also, I think... Hm? That's odd.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Is your intuition speaking
to you again?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You'd love that, wouldn't you? But yeah,
it's that lady. She looked like an election
official, but there's no reason for her
to be wandering around here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Like a wild dog with a scent, that one.
Always running off.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Hi there. Lita Caryx with the Post.
Care to tell me what's in the
box there? Because it looks
an awful lot like ballot paper.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Strange_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Ack! I can't believe someone saw me!
But yeah, that's right: it's ballot paper.
What are you going to do about it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You don't have enough ballots there to even make
a dent in the totals for Capitol City, much less
the entire Union States. Which means you're
trying to pull something else.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I'm guessing you WANT me to report this in order
to reduce people's faith in the election—because
whoever comes out of a fraudulent election is
going to see their power greatly undermined.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
The aliens will find your ruler more
pliable if his power is compromised.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You aliens thought I'd be so hungry for a scoop
that I'd fall for an obvious trick like this?
Boy, that really grinds my gears—I should
punch you right in your smug face!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Why are you looking at me? Ah, I see.
The Dismal King grants you permission
to slay this enemy however you like.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
You have really bad instincts sometimes.
You know that, right?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Anyways, get the heck out of my sight,
you alien puke—and don't come back!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Right then. Time to contact everyone
and make sure this doesn't turn into
some huge kerfuffle.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_ELECTION_010_CUT_000_1.text:
Yes, this does not necessarily
foretell the end.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Well, there you have it: the one who
started with the upper hand pulled
out the victory in the end. Despite everything that happened,
Allen was just the stronger candidate.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
But now the election's over—and once the
inauguration coverage is done, I imagine
my work will calm down for a while. Sooo...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Say, what do you have on the
books tomorrow? Anything?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
My books are, as ever,
entirely mine for filling.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Well, I got a call from my contact at the
National Research Institute, and he wants
me to go to the Inspectorate tomorrow.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
He's a little fuzzy on the details,
but apparently an ally at the
Inspectorate needs a favor from us.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
We can hear this ally out. Though I must say,
your organization seems to have infiltrated
every level of your society.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Oh, it's big all right—so big, in fact,
that I'm part of the group and don't
even know the entire scope of things. Anyway, sorry to drag you on another
errand, but let's head there tomorrow.
Good night.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_A_000_C.text:
Good morning, sunshine!
Let's get going.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I was told to come to the Inspectorate.
Should we just...wait here?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, wonderful! You dears both made it.
I'm the one who called you, but we
can't talk here. Please follow me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe YOU'RE
our ally here, Jessica!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
And I can't believe that fact evaded an
ace reporter like you! Hee hee hee! Well, I suppose I've been doing a good job—
which is good, because all of this wouldn't
have been possible otherwise.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
But it's not you I have business
with, Lita. It's Siugnas.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
We want to dispatch the aliens in Capitol City
before the next president takes office—and to
do that, we need your help. Please consider this a formal request
from the President of the Union States,
and weigh it appropriately.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
As the king myself, I know well your feelings.
A world's ruler is the world itself—and if your
ruler deems the aliens unneeded, they must be
expunged from it with all haste.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
But that is a problem for your people,
for I've no interest in a world of peace.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, Lita? You're his friend.
What do you think?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I've been fighting the aliens,
so of course I want to see them
driven out of the country... But as Siugnas's friend, I understand
what he's talking about. He's the kind
of person who handles his own problems
instead of leaving them for others.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_000_CUT_0.text:
I see. Well then, I suppose I've no choice
but to leave the decision in your hands.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I sense a great darkness ahead.
Let us be off.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
You need permission to operate
this particular elevator, dear.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Should I take the fact you're proceeding
to mean you will accept the request I
made of you earlier?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: That depends on all of you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Jessica
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: I believe in you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: You are coming, Lita?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Of course. Whenever you find this darkness
of yours, I'm sure it's gonna make for one
heck of a great show!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Then let us be off.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
There's no security here...
What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Where is your president?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
I don't know who you are,
but don't come near me!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Do you believe such an incantation
could deter the Dismal King?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: STOP!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Stop! The enemy—

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Stop! The enemy is reacting
to your movements!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
So reckless! How many times did you
have to fight trying to come over here?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Thrice. Still, enemies that react to
my movements are most intriguing.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
You survived THREE battles? Your experience
fighting aliens is on full display. Despite the current situation, I welcome you,
Siugnas the Dismal King, to the Office of
the President of the Union States. May I
take this to mean you accepted my request?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: Let us leave it there for now.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
My, my! Having you AND the president here
together certainly does save me some trouble—
for you both serve as obstacles to our
cooperation with the next president!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
You think you can defeat me?
I thought you wiser than that.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Such arrogance! You'll soon realize we have
only been toying with you until now!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
And with that, I believe you've dealt with all
the aliens in the vicinity. I shudder to think
of what might have happened had you not arrived
when you did. Now all that remains is to capture the
remaining aliens before the transfer of power
to the next administration.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
This was the first time you were
attacked by the aliens? Why now?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Eight years ago, shortly after I took
office, we learned of the existence
of the aliens. We knew we had to control the narrative of
such an explosive story, so we contacted them
and began a series of discreet dealings. Over time, I forged a policy in which
I sometimes accept their various demands,
but ultimately minimize their influence.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: And?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Their demands have escalated recently,
up to and including things that pose
a threat to the very independence of
the Union States. We also received credible intelligence that
they were in contact with a presidential
candidate, at which point we had no choice
but to act.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
The existence of the anti-alien organization—
as well as you, Siugnas—pushed us to make
the decision we did.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Don't you think the fact you've kept
this from the public for eight years
is problematic, Mr. President?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text: That's a question you would have as a reporter, yes? But what is your opinion as a member of the anti-alien organization? Do you truly think we should leave the question of how to deal with aliens up to the wider public?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, judging by how the aliens
have been conducting themselves...
No. No, we probably shouldn't.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
We arrived at the same conclusion.
We kept the aliens a secret in order
to protect the Union States, but also
because the aliens themselves wished it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Thanks to you all, the secret has been kept.
And I would ask that you continue to keep
all that has occurred here in the strictest
of confidences.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Now then, Siugnas. Have you located
this 'darkness' you seek?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_A_010_CUT_0.text:
Oh yes, this world truly was fascinating. 
I shall be taking my leave before long.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_B_000_C.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_HUM_B_000_C.text:
I can't believe Bailey came from behind
and pulled it out! People are going to
be talking about this election for years.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Greetings. I am the President of the
Union States. Welcome to my office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I can't believe the president
was actually an alien!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text: This is the true president, Lita.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Jessica sent us here
to help, Mr. President.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Ah, so she did. I take this to mean you
have dispatched the impersonator?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
We have, Mr. President—and I'm
glad we could be of assistance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I first learned of the aliens eight years
ago when I took over from my predecessor. I'd found some of his policy decisions to be
strange, but in that instant, the mystery
was solved: the Union States' government
was being subjected to alien interference.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Throughout my eight years in office, I've
worked to weaken their influence, ignoring
the meager scraps they tried to toss our way.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Quite burdensome, from the
perspective of the aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Quite. In fact, they found me so difficult
to deal with, they attempted to interfere
with the last election—but I was re-elected
anyway with the public's support.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Which brings us to the current election.
Knowing my successor would have trouble
dealing with the aliens, my administration
devised a plan to wipe them out. Sadly, they got the jump on me,
which was an inexcusable blunder
on my part as commander-in-chief.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
But thanks to all of your brave efforts,
we've managed to recover our position.
Now all that remains is to track down
the remaining aliens.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
But what if more aliens come?
I mean, you won't be president forever.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
After I leave office, I plan to lead the anti-
alien organization. If there is another secret
invasion, I will reveal their existence and call
upon the Union States to stand against them.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Gotta say, it feels really good
to have a hero of the Channel War
leading our organization.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
I'd like to offer special thanks to you,
Siugnas. Have you located this 'darkness'
that you seek?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_HUM_B_010_CUT_0.text:
Indeed. This world is truly fascinating,
and I have had a most enjoyable journey.
But I will be taking my leave before long.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Well, there you have it: the one who started
out with the upper hand pulled out the win.
Despite everything that happened, Allen was
just the stronger candidate in the end.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Not hardly, I'll have plenty of events
to cover until the inauguration, but at
least things won't be anywhere near as
nuts as they were during the election.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
I know what you meant: you want me
to come on your journey tomorrow—
and I absolutely will. I said I'd follow you wherever, but it
turns out you mostly ended up following
ME on various stories, and I'm sorry.
Anyway, good night.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text:
Siugnas! We've got an emergency.
You have to come with me to the
laboratory right now!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text: You certainly don't lack for trouble.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MEC_000_CUT.text: No time for chatter. Come on!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Intermittent distortions have been observed
at the Office of the President. We've never
seen anything quite like this before.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Distortions presaging the manifestation
of that other dimension, I wager.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Yes, and we should expect the worst.
Did you call the cops?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
The police would laugh me out of the room
if I called them and said 'something's
happening at the president's office.'

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Then we must choose whether to go
or ignore the situation.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
We can't go with option B, but we need
permission to use the elevator to the
presidential office, and making a
formal application takes forever!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Then we'll just force our way in. Here,
I hacked this ID to have full elevator
privileges, and you're welcome to use it.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh ho! Throwing wide the gates of your
royal fortress? I had no idea you were
capable of such violence, scientist!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
My skills definitely aren't cut out for this sort
of thing. But I'll tell you this: if you're found,
it'll be the end for you. So be careful.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_000_CUT_000.text:
Being caught means nothing compared
to what'll happen if we fail.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
Are you sure about this, Siugnas?
You know you don't have to come.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
Greater chaos reveals ever more of a
person's darkness—and I would see this
for myself.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text:
You WOULD enjoy something like this.
Still, that's why I can count on you
more than anyone else.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_000.text: Let us go to the presidential office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.text:
So this was the cause
of the distortion.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_020.text: Mr. President! Are you all right?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text: Look closer. This man is human.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
We were told of an emergency here
and came to see for ourselves.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
So in other words, you're members
of the anti-alien organization. Well, I suppose that would make you
Siugnas, yes? Thank you for showing
up here just in time.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
My administration is aware of the beings
you call aliens, and we have been keeping
a careful watch on their activities. That said, I never expected they might
mount such a bold attack so soon after
the presidential election.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
That alien assumed your form.
What did it hope to achieve by
masquerading as this land's ruler?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
They must have been mad to think they could
deceive our people with that thing, and yet
it's all a bit much for a practical joke.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Do you think they'll try
something like this again?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
I suspect the answer to that is yes,
although we'll attempt to use more
proactive measures moving forward. We'll need to hand power over to the
next administration, and I'm sure we'll
need your organization's help as well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Now then, Siugnas! I hear you are seeking
'fascinating individuals.' Have you found
what you sought yet?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Indeed. This world was filled with darkness
most compelling, and I have thoroughly
enjoyed my time here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MEC_010_CUT_030.text:
Yes. But now it is time for me to take
my leave of this place. Fare you well.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MON_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_MON_000_CUT.text:
Bailey really turned things around for himself.
He's going to be a different kind of president
than what we've had before, and I'm looking
forward to what happens in the future.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
There's no security here?
What's going on?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
Okay, what the heck?
TWO presidents?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
One is your president, the other an alien.
What do you make of it?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text:
I'm confused, that's what I make of it.
And it looks like the president's staff
are just as befuddled as I am!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_010.text: Then I will resolve this for you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
I am the Dismal King! All darkness bends
to my sway! My gaze cannot be misled!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
Are you CRAZY!? What was your
plan if you got the wrong one?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
A fair question—and yet, I love
the conviction you acted with!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
I admit surprise as to how unperturbed
you were by my display of power.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
I imagine you are members of the anti-alien
organization—which would make you Siugnas?
Thank you for showing up here to save me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
What did that alien hope to achieve
by masquerading as this land's ruler?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQBOSS_MON_010_CUT_020.text:
Indeed. This world was filled with darkness
most compelling, and I thoroughly enjoyed
myself. But now, I must take my leave.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Thus is your next ruler decided. This conflict
gave rise to much darkness, and made it a
truly enjoyable journey for me.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Oh, don't get the idea that's how all our
elections go; this one was particularly
eventful. But hey, now I get to cover the
events leading up to the inauguration!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Then I will make my way around the city,
for I suspect this will not be the end.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Come on, don't speak that kind
of stuff into existence! But I suppose the everyday things that go on here
and DON'T have anything to do with the election
would still be new to you. And since I've got some
time to play with, I'll keep showing you around.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
I am obliged. Also, your report on our
activities not yet complete, no?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Yeah, you got me. In that case,
we'll look around town tomorrow.
Good night, Siugnas.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text: All right, let's get ready to go.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Well, howdy there, partners! We're
with the marshal's office, and we're
gonna need this tall drink of water
here to come along with us.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Can't answer that one, hon.
Now shake your spurs.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Wait! If you're taking him, I'm coming.
I'm in the middle of covering him for an
in-depth story.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text: Sorry, darlin', but he goes alone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
The woman comes with us.
I will brook no objections.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_RESULTNEWS_GOV_000_CUT.text:
Well, ain't you just a peach!
But fine. You want your gal along,
we'll go ahead and let 'er come.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.text:
So we're going to the
Office of the President?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_000_.text:
We sure are, hon—and you've been
given official permission to tag along!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: Go right in here.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: May this invitation prove entertaining.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Welcome to the presidential grounds.
You must be Siugnas and Shungiku Hanabusa—
Ah, but you prefer Lita, do you not? As you probably know, I am the
President of the Union States.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I called you here today so we could
speak about the beings you call aliens.
Put simply, they do not exist.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
What? No! But we've seen them!
And we have hard observational data!

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
All of which are products
of government experiments.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Just as you created an anti-alien organization
to carry out your activities, the government
has also been conducting various experiments in
preparation for interference from other worlds. An example of this is the unique
'other dimension' you have experienced.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
You, Siugnas, have a higher than normal
chance to enter such special spaces—and
I believe you are well aware of the reason.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Your appearance here brought our experiments
to the next phase. It proved that interference
from the outside is a real possibility.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
These experiments will now be inherited
by the next administration—and it's all
thanks to you, Siugnas.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Okay, hang on! What about our organization!?
We've been working like dogs to protect this
country and its people, and it was all...
What? A waste!? A fantasy!?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Sadly, Lita, I need you to bear an even
heavier burden: you must never let your
organization know the truth. I would have you carry out your activities
just as before—which is why you must
forget all that you learned here today.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
You may regret coming along with
Siugnas, but doing so was a choice
made by you alone. If you wish my advice, I would suggest you
leave the organization entirely. I believe
you could live more easily that way.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Some of your members, such as
Dr. Nishant, will be recruited to
other government organizations.
But as for you...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I understand, Mr. President. I'm a citizen
of the Union States, and I have pledged my
allegiance to the flag. I will do my duty. BUT! In exchange, I want an exclusive,
all-access, nothing-off-the-record
interview the day you leave office.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
I agree to your terms—and in truth,
I rather expected this.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Hope you don't regret this, Mr. President!
'Cause after eight years in office, I have a
boatload of questions for you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
Now, Siugnas, I have one more request for you:
I want you to leave the Union States immediately.
All traces of your existence will be purged;
not even the next administration will know. As the ruler of another world, I trust
you understand why I make this request?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text:
You have my thanks, President. I have encountered
darkness of all shades since coming to this world,
and truly enjoyed myself. And in the end, I was able
to bear witness to a TRULY wonderful darkness! This was an utterly fascinating world,
and yet, I will bid it farewell.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mr_President
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_000_CUT_010_.text: I'm grateful you understand.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
You are a person of great intrigue,
and I have come for you.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Yes, O Dismal King.
My heart is yours forever.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.text:
I cannot take you with me, but I accept
your fealty. Your soul shall ever be as
one with my own.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Researcher_Nishant
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_01.text:
I offer up all that I am
for my Dismal King...

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
So you're leaving us, Siugnas?
And, uh... Through a manhole?

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
I have but to picture it as a gateway
to another world, and it shall open.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
That makes no sense at all.
You'd be a crummy journalist.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
No—for I am the Dismal King. But before
I depart, I would have you know how
grateful I am for your assistance.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text: I know our time together was short, but it was also really fun.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text:
Wow. He's really gone. Thought he might
open the manhole cover and leave, but nope.
He's just...gone.

SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W18_EVAR_SIUG_WQEND_GOV_010_CUT_000_.text: I hope we meet again someday, Siugnas.
